road 4) 12. Berenga Ferry Service SDB Gangapur has partially submerged as per report received from IWT Department as on dated
6.6.2024), (Katigorah - IWT Department Report 1) Buribail Ferry Service All the three boats in damaged condition which were in dry

the both side approach 3) Rajartilla Ferry Service Damaged boat SDB Rupaiball which was in dry docked condition for repairing is still
